H0.text: Nephrons are the structural and functional units of the kidneys.

H1.text: Interneurons are the structural and functional units of the kidneys.

H2.text: Fat cells are the structural and functional units of the kidneys.

H3.text: Dendrites are the structural and functional units of the kidneys.

A4.text: The nephron is the minute or microscopic structural and functional unit of the kidney.
